main.title: TT_Send
label.feePerByte.toolTip: TT_The fee paid (per byte) to veriblock miners. Higher fees incentivize miners to include your transaction in their blocks more quickly.
drain_warning:
TT_This will drain all coins from %1$s to %2$s using the fee per byte of %3$s.
The resulting balance for %1$s will be 0.00000000 %4$s.
Do you want to continue?
send.validation.feeTooLow: TT_Transaction fee is too low, it should be more than %1$s
send.validation.areYouSure2: TT_Are you sure you want to send %1$s %2$s to this address? It cannot be undone.
send.validation.sentButNoId: TT_Sent amount %1$s to address %2$s... Send command did not return transaction Id
send.validation.successDetail2:
TT_Sent from Address: %8$s
Sent to Address: %2$s

Source Amount: %7$s %6$s
Fees: %5$s %6$s = (%9$s bytes x %10$s %6$s per byte)
Sent Amount: %1$s %6$s

%3$s transaction(s):
%4$s
send.validation.errorSending: TT_There was an error and nothing was sent:
send.validation.belowWarning: TT_FeePerByte is below the warning threshold %1$s, do you want to continue?
send.validation.aboveWarning: TT_FeePerByte is above the warning threshold %1$s, do you want to continue?
send.validation.aboveWarning2:
TT_FeePerByte is %1$s, which above the warning threshold of %2$s.
Do you want to continue?
send.validation.aboveVeryWarning:
TT_FeePerByte is VERY high! FeePerByte is %1$s, which is about %3$sx the warning threshold of %2$s!!
This means you are probably paying more for fees than you need to.
Do you want to continue?
